events.event: RAND Corporation analyst, Defense Department consultant
Access to Pentagon Papers (classified Vietnam War study) at RAND
Photocopies Pentagon Papers, provides to New York Times and Washington Post
New York Times begins publishing Pentagon Papers
White House Plumbers break into Ellsberg's psychiatrist office
Indicted under Espionage Act, faces 115 years in prison
Trial dismissed due to government misconduct (wiretapping, break-in)
Supports Chelsea Manning after WikiLeaks disclosures
Supports Edward Snowden, aids in asylum efforts
Publishes 'The Doomsday Machine' - reveals nuclear war planning secrets
